37174.この先は 住宅村です。\n住宅村では 土地と家キットを購入することで\nこの世界:
Down this way is the residential district. To own your own home, you'll need to purchase a plot and a housing kit.
To purchase a plot of land, examine the sign in front of an empty plot.
There are two sizes of plots: Small size and Medium size.
Both plot sizes drop in price 4 times per day at 3 a.m., 9 a.m., 3 p.m., and 9 p.m.
S-size plots begin at 500,000 Gold and drop increments of 5,000 Gold, to a minimum of 20,000 Gold.
M-size plots begin at 2,500,000 Gold and drop in increments of 25,000 Gold, to a minimum of 100,000 Gold.
Please note that if you are playing the trial version, you may only purchase S-size plots of land.
You can freely arrange various types of furniture in your house, so be sure to decorate and invite your friends over!
You can store items in dressers, recover in beds, and even use furniture that have special functions.

37175.土地や 家キットは とても高価ですが\nがんばって 入手してください！\n<bw:
Plots and house kits can be very expensive,
so do your best to get them!
<bw_break>

119096.『すべての丁目からさがす』から\n指定した地区の 空いてる土地だけを\n調べるこ:
You can now search for available land in a specific district by selecting "Search by All". After selecting the size of the land
you want to look up, select the district and then select "Search from All" to see a list of all available land. If you select a lot on
the list that you want to buy, you can go to that lot... When I refresh the page with "View Next 50" or "View Previous 50", any
land that has sold will be removed from the list...

119097.『すべての丁目からさがす』は\n住宅村の外からは 利用できません。\n住宅村の中:
You can't use "Search All Blocks" from outside
the residential area. Try it again once
inside.

119820.空いている土地がありませんでした。\n検索条件を変更するか\n時間をおいてから:
There are no available plots at this time.
Please search again or try changing your
search criteria.

131827.この先は ラッカラン住宅村です。\n住宅村では 土地と家キットを購入することで\:
Down this way is the Luckland residential area. There, you can purchase a plot of land and a house kit for your very own home!
To purchase a plot of land, you'll need to first examine the signpost in front of it.
There are two plot sizes: "S" and "M". Only M sized plots are available here.
All plots are priced at 100,000,000 Gold. This price is final and will not change.
The Luckland residential area is quite special, offering convenient facilities and gorgeous sceneryーdespite its price.
